caption.p: Stratigraphic overview showing the contact between the Sunjiagou and Liujiagou formations. White triangles denote upward fining cycles in the Sunjiagou Formation. Dotted line denotes base of the PTB interval. GPS: 38° 45′ 59.60″ N, 112° 04′ 50.222″ E. Abbreviations: Fm, Formation; PTB, Permian-Triassic boundary; Z.C.Z created this figure using CorelDRAW14. Photo credit: Y.Q.L.
